title: Vestorly's Wisz on Artificial Intelligence for Advisers (Audio)
itunes:title: Vestorly's Wisz on Artificial Intelligence for Advisers (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Justin Wisz, co-founder and CEO of Vestorly, on how artificial intelligence can be used by investment advisers to augment profitability.
